item.title: Hugo + Github + Markdown
item.description: Preperation - Hugo - Github - MarkDown Hugo Installation by Chocolatey or Scoop (Windows) choco install hugo -confirm scoop install hugo other OS check me Git Installation Download Link After installed Git, edit the path which is your system environment variables 1. Create a new Hugo project by cmd: let’s say our project name is hugo_blog hugo new site hugo_blog enter the new project file
